name: LD30 - Planetary Devourers
description:
LD30 - Planetary Devourers

Planetary Devourers is a game made within 72 hours for Ludum Dare 30. The theme was "Connected Worlds."

In this game, you control a swarm of planetary devourers, and your objective is to move through the universe from warpgate to warpgate so that your species can survive. After all, consuming the planet(s) you occupy doesn't exactly enable you to just sit back and relax. You can't survive on a destroyed planet.
